entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Twillingate
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:49 AM NST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Twillingate 1:30 PM NST Thursday 12 January 2023
Temperature: -7.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -12.2°C
Wind: W 19 km/h gust 31 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny except mainly cloudy along parts of the coast. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 18. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 12 except minus 16 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: A few clouds except mainly cloudy along parts of the coast this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 12 except minus 16 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 18 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Thursday 12 January 2023
